verses.verse: (A Psalm of David.) O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> may abide <S%H1481><s%> <S%H7931><s%> in Thy tent <S%H168><s%>? Who <S%H4310><s%> may dwell <S%H7931><s%> on Thy holy <S%H6944><s%> hill <S%H2022><s%>?
He who walks <S%H1980><s%> with integrity, <S%H8549><s%> and works <S%H6466><s%> righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> And speaks <S%H1696><s%> truth <S%H571><s%> in his heart. <S%H3824><s%>

He does not slander <S%H7270><s%> with his tongue, <S%H3956><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> does <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H9567><s%> to his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> takes <S%H5375><s%> up a reproach <S%H2781><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> his friend; <S%H7453><s%>

In whose eyes <S%H5869><s%> a reprobate <S%H3988><s%> is despised, <S%H959><s%> But who honors <S%H3513><s%> those who fear <S%H3372><s%> the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> He swears <S%H7650><s%> to his own hurt, <S%H7489><s%> and does not change; <S%H4171><s%>

He does not put <S%H5414><s%> out his money <S%H3701><s%> at interest, <S%H5392><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> does he take <S%H3947><s%> a bribe <S%H7810><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the innocent. <S%H9345><s%> He who does <S%H6213><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things <S%H428><s%> will never <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5769><s%> be shaken. <S%H4131><s%>
